mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dong, dongCode from houseinfo where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dong

select distinct si.sidoName, gu.gugunName, dong from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{aptcode}
select d.dongCode, concat(d.sidoName, ' ', d.gugunName, ' ', d.dongName) address, s.cnt from dongcode d, searchapt s where d.dongCode = s.dongcode order by s.cnt desc limit 10;

select h.aptCode, h.apartmentName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by apartmentName

select * from (select h.aptCode, h.apartmentName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, h.lat, h.lng from houseinfo h, sidocode si, guguncode gu where left(h.dongcode, 2) = left(si.sidocode, 2) and left(h.dongcode, 5) = left(gu.guguncode, 5) and h.dongCode = #{aptcode}) a, (select h.aptCode, d.dealAmount recentPrice, d.dealYear recentYear, d.dealMonth recentMonth, d.dealDay recentDay, d.area, d.floor from housedeal d, houseinfo h where d.aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal hd where hd.aptCode = h.aptCode)) b where a.aptCode = b.aptCode order by a.apartmentName

select * from (select h.aptCode, h.apartmentName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, h.lat, h.lng from houseinfo h, sidocode si, guguncode gu where left(h.dongcode, 2) = left(si.sidocode, 2) and left(h.dongcode, 5) = left(gu.guguncode, 5) and h.dongCode = #{aptcode}) a, (select h.aptCode, d.dealAmount recentPrice, d.dealYear recentYear, d.dealMonth recentMonth, d.dealDay recentDay, d.area, d.floor from housedeal d, houseinfo h where d.aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal hd where hd.aptCode = h.aptCode)) b where a.aptCode = b.aptCode order by a.apartmentName desc

mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where userid = #{userid} and aptCode = #{aptCode}
mapper.select: select * from bookmark where userid = #{userid} and aptCode = #{aptCode}

select a.aptCode, i.apartmentName, i.buildyear, i.dongCode, i.dong, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, hd.dealAmount recentPrice, hd.dealYear recentYear, hd.dealMonth recentMonth, hd.dealDay recentDay, hd.area, hd.floor from (select b.aptCode, max(no) num from bookmark b, housedeal d where b.aptCode = d.aptCode and userid = #{userid} group by b.aptCode ) a, houseinfo i, housedeal hd, sidocode si, guguncode gu where a.aptCode = i.aptCode and i.aptCode = hd.aptCode and left(i.dongcode, 2) = left(si.sidocode, 2) and left(i.dongcode, 5) = left(gu.guguncode, 5) and a.num = hd.no;

select h.apartmentName, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, h.dong from houseinfo h, sidocode si, guguncode gu, (select aptCode from bookmark group by aptCode order by count(*) limit 10) a where h.aptCode = a.aptCode and left(h.dongcode, 2) = left(si.sidocode, 2) and left(h.dongcode, 5) = left(gu.guguncode, 5)
